Package game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BotPlayer
    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Player. A Player has a name to identify them, a Pawn they move on the field, a certain amount of money to pay for Domains and pay taxes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private boolean inJail
      Makes us know if the player is in jail or not.
      private int leaveJailCard
      Indicate if a player have a leaveJailCard thanks to communityChest or chance card

      The loan that can be made from the player.

      Represents the location of the player on the field

      Represents the number of laps still left before going out from jail.

      Represents the pawn of the player which is moving on the field.

      The list of properties this player owns

      private boolean stillPlaying

      • pay

        public boolean pay​(Player player,
                   int price)
        The current player pays the given player a given price if they can. If the current player has unlocked the Negociator skill, the amount to pay is reduced, therefore, the amount that the other player receives is also reduced.
        Parameters:
        player - the player that receives the money
        price - the price this player pays the given player
        Returns:
        true if this player could pay, false otherwise

      • pay

        public boolean pay​(int price)
        This player pays the given price if they have enough money.
        Parameters:
        price - the price this player has to pay
        Returns:
        true if this player has enough money, false otherwise

        Parameters:

        Returns:
